Alias.name: Practice Warrior
Alias.script: if practice_trainer:pracs_to_level() > 51 then practice_trainer:echo( "More than 51 levels required. Cannot practice this practice setup.\n", false, true ) else for k, v in pairs(practice_trainer.warrior.pracs) do for i = 1, v, 1 do send("practice " .. k) end end end

Alias.name: Practice Rogue
Alias.script: if practice_trainer:pracs_to_level() > 51 then practice_trainer:echo( "More than 51 levels required. Cannot practice this practice setup.\n", false, true ) else for k, v in pairs(practice_trainer.rogue.pracs) do for i = 1, v, 1 do send("practice " .. k) end end end

Alias.name: Practice Hunter
Alias.script: if practice_trainer:pracs_to_level() > 51 then practice_trainer:echo( "More than 51 levels required. Cannot practice this practice setup.\n", false, true ) else for k, v in pairs(practice_trainer.hunter.pracs) do for i = 1, v, 1 do send("practice " .. k) end end end
